title: Aleksei Guschin
text:
Aleksei Anatolievich Guschin ( born 21 October 1971) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28football%29">defender</a>.
He capped for USSR U-20 team at <a href="1991%20FIFA%20World%20Youth%20Championship">1991 FIFA World Youth Championship</a>.
